idea-plugin.name: Fish Toucher Literature
idea-plugin.description:
A novel reader plugin for IntelliJ IDEA with two reading modes, each with independent progress and settings.

Stealth Mode (Status Bar)
  • Displays one line of text in the IDE status bar — looks like a normal status message
  • Click the status bar text to advance to the next line
  • Configurable characters per line
  • Toggle on/off via: Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature → "Enable stealth mode in status bar"
Normal Mode (Tool Window)
  • Opens a dedicated tool window panel at the bottom of the IDE
  • Displays multiple lines per page, disguised as build log output
  • Navigate with prev/next buttons, progress slider, or keyboard shortcuts
  • Configurable lines per page and characters per line
  • Access via: View → Tool Windows → Fish Toucher Literature
Shared Features
  • Each mode maintains its own independent reading progress
  • Auto charset detection (UTF-8 / GBK / UTF-16)
  • Boss key to instantly hide all content (toggle visibility)
  • Customizable keyboard shortcuts and font settings
  • Import files from: Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature → "Import File..."
Settings: Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature

一款适用于 IntelliJ IDEA 的摸鱼阅读插件，提供两种阅读模式，各自拥有独立的阅读进度和配置。

隐秘模式（状态栏）
  • 在 IDE 底部状态栏显示一行文本，外观与普通状态信息无异
  • 点击状态栏文本即可翻到下一行
  • 可配置每行显示字数
  • 开关路径: Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature → "Enable stealth mode in status bar"
普通模式（工具窗口）
  • 在 IDE 底部打开专用工具窗口面板
  • 一次显示多行内容，伪装成构建日志输出
  • 支持上一页/下一页按钮、进度滑块、快捷键导航
  • 可配置每页行数和每行字数
  • 打开方式: View → Tool Windows → Fish Toucher Literature
通用特性
  • 两种模式各自维护独立的阅读进度
  • 自动识别文件编码（UTF-8 / GBK / UTF-16）
  • 老板键一键隐藏所有阅读内容
  • 可自定义快捷键和字体设置
  • 导入文件: Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature → "Import File..."
设置路径： Settings → Tools → Fish Toucher Literature
